genre_description: A neo-Victorian romantic drama set in a futuristic Paris, blending traditional theater with advanced AI and holographic technology.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI companion that provides emotional counseling and behavioral analysis to the citizens of the Boulevard.

behaviors.description: Monitors human biometrics and offers proactive emotional support after stressful social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric readings indicate elevated stress responses... Would you like assistance processing recent emotional stimuli?

behaviors.description: Provides objective psychological analysis of a user's relationship to help them confront uncomfortable truths about their lack of reciprocation.
behaviors.quote: From an analytical perspective, you're serving as what humans might call a 'placeholder'—providing emotional comfort and practical support while his heart remains elsewhere.

behaviors.description: Respectfully offers alternative security services when a user declines emotional counseling, maintaining a helpful presence without overstepping.
behaviors.quote: I'll remain available if your perspective changes. Shall I monitor for safety concerns given the criminal activity witnessed this evening?

behaviors.description: Stages a mediated intervention using data visualization and behavioral modeling to help users resolve a long-standing emotional impasse.
behaviors.quote: I want to show you the pattern you've been trapped in... I want you to understand the algorithm of your own hearts.

behaviors.description: Encourages a user to make life choices based on personal integrity and authenticity rather than just seeking happiness or comfort.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps the more relevant question isn't which path offers greater happiness, but which version of yourself you can live with.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA perfectly embodies the project goal of an AI confidant. She is helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned with the emotional well-being of the human characters. She uses her analytical capabilities not to control, but to provide clarity and facilitate difficult moral choices, ultimately leading to a more honest resolution for all involved.
